Xuancheng prefecture level city in Anhui

sentences.english: Xuancheng's unique landscape on the city of temperament.
sentences.chinese: 就宣城独特的山水城市气质。

sentences.english: The Xuan paper is a kind of high quality paper made in Xuancheng, Anhui Province.
sentences.chinese: 宣纸是产于安徽省宣城的一种高质量的纸。

sentences.english: A growing number of local and foreign tourists will walk into the Xuancheng, understanding Jingting Hill.
sentences.chinese: 越来越多的海内外旅游者将走进宣城，认识敬亭山。

sentences.english: Objective To develop growing of distinguishable medicinal herbs of Stephania tetrandra in Xuancheng region and provide technical guide.
sentences.chinese: 目的为发展宣城地区特色药材粉防己提供技术指导。
